description: An American comedy series hosted by comedian Richard Pryor
keywords: actor name in series title,actor plays himself,actor plays multiple roles,actress plays multiple roles,four word title
name: The Richard Pryor Show

review.name: Shocked, It Was Just Four Episodes!
review.reviewBody: Oh my goodness! I cannot believe this was just four episodes. But I sure can understand why. Richard Pryor Touched on topics that was taboo back then, but pretty commonplace today. The four episodes were excellent, a little over-the-top, but again excellent, yet, way ahead of our time. I enjoyed those four episodes I wish he could have made many more.
